text: Michel Maïque (13 July 1948 - 12 September 2021) was a French rugby league player and politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was Mayor of Lézignan-Corbières from 2014 to 2020. From 1974 until 1979, he played for the national team. He was born in Aude, France. Maïque died on 12 September 2021 in Lézignan-Corbières from pancreatitis at the age of 73.Lézignan-Corbières : Décès de Michel Maïque, le souvenir d'un élu de terrain ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:French rugby union players Category:People from Aude Category:Sportspeople from Occitanie Category:Politicians from Occitanie
title: Michel Maïque
